name: GoPro Dual Battery Charger + Battery HERO9
description: Add amplitude to your GoPro HERO9 Black. Drop 2 batteries into the charger and increase the amount of footage you can get in a day!Charges 2 GoPro HERO9 Black batteries at the same time.Compatible with GoPro Supercharger.Dual LED charging status lights let you know when your batteries are good to go.Includes 1 HERO9 Black 1720mAh lithium ion battery, 1 dual-battery charger and 1 USB-C cable.
